data.message: Nice work.. First one I like it because it's on solar power no harm to environment and second it's useful for remote location people's who don't have access. All the very best for the future steps..

replies.message: Thanks for the kind words, Karthikeyan. We'll definitely keep up the good work! -Rey
No harm to the environment?  How about wildlife, the raidowaves being sent out what is there effect?  The battries involved, crashes, etc..

Robert Rosania If we think on that way then the simple paper also involved on environmental or global warming. So we need to consider the benefits rather than the minimal effects.. Moreover its just a first step so they will think on all the ways in future to overcome.. Please be patience and encourage the invention with social motive.
What benefits? FaceBook to people who don't have clean drinking water?
